arStrings.szText: Whenever {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} damages an enemy, {c_number}2{/c} additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of {c_important}Penetrating Shot's{/c} Base damage and do not split.
{c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} creates {c_number}2{/c} additional arrows that deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the Base damage.
